fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • The landholding figure for Forestry Commission Scotland is 638,600 hectares, not 259,000 (Alert over ‘corrosive’ effects in Scotland of rich monopoly landlords, 20 March, page 7). • New Zealand’s prime minister identifies as agnostic, not atheist as we had it (Jacinda Ardern is showing the world what real leadership is, 19 March, page 3, G2). • Other recently corrected articles include: The Guardian view on regulating porn: wrong step, right direction Chicago’s Democratic socialists on brink of transforming city’s politics
